mapper.select:
SELECT hws.server_id, hws.webhook_address, hws.server_type, hws.enabled_flag, hts.message_code as messageCode, hts.message_name as messageName, hts.temp_server_id as tempServerId FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh htsh ON htsh.server_code = hws.server_code INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.temp_server_id = htsh.temp_server_id AND ( htsl.template_code LIKE '%JSON%' OR htsl.template_code LIKE '%DINGTALKANDWECHAT%' ) INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id
INNER JOIN webhook_project_rel wpr on wpr.project_id=#{projectId} and wpr.webhook_id=hws.server_id
where hws.tenant_id=#{tenantId}
AND hts.message_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{messageName}),'%')
AND hws.type=#{type}
AND hws.enabled_flag='enableFlag'
AND (hws.webhook_address like concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%') or hts.message_name like concat(concat('%',#{params}),'%'))
mapper.delete: DELETE hws.*, htsl.*, wpr.*, hwsh.* FROM hmsg_webhook_server AS hws JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.server_code = hws.server_code LEFT JOIN webhook_project_rel wpr ON wpr.webhook_id = hws.server_id JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh hwsh ON hwsh.server_code = hws.server_code WHERE hws.server_id=#{webhookId}
mapper.select: SELECT any_value ( hws.server_id ) AS server_id, any_value ( hws.webhook_address ) AS webhook_address, any_value ( hws.server_type ) AS server_type, any_value ( hws.enabled_flag ) AS enabled_flag, any_value ( hts.message_name ) AS messageName, any_value ( hts.message_code ) AS messageCode, any_value ( hts.temp_server_id ) AS tempServerId FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws, hmsg_template_server_line htsl, hmsg_template_server hts WHERE htsl.template_code LIKE CONCAT( '%', hws.server_type, '%' ) AND hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id AND hws.enabled_flag=1 GROUP BY hts.message_code
SELECT htsw.temp_server_id FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh htsw ON hws.server_code = htsw.server_code WHERE hws.server_id =#{webHookId}
